text: Billund is a town in Jutland, Denmark. In 2021, 6,643 people lived there.BY3: Population 1. January by urban areas, area and population density The Mobile Statbank from Statistics Denmark The toy company Lego has its main office in Billund. It is also the site of a theme park Legoland and Billund Airport which is the second largest airport in Denmark. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Towns in Denmark Category:Region of Southern Denmark
title: Billund
